body_html:
I am working with @lwogulis. We are building from source with the command above (broken below for better visibility),

PYTHON_BIN_PATH=/usr/bin/python3 \
TF_NEED_GCP=0 \
TF_NEED_HDFS=0 \
PYTHON_LIB_PATH=/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages \
TF_NEED_OPENCL=0 \
TF_NEED_CUDA=0 \
TF_ENABLE_XLA=1 \
TF_NEED_JEMALLOC=1 \
CC_OPT_FLAGS="-march=native" \
./configure

See above for the rest of the compile/install commands.

body:
I am working with @lwogulis. We are building from source with the command above (broken below for better visibility),

```
PYTHON_BIN_PATH=/usr/bin/python3 \
TF_NEED_GCP=0 \
TF_NEED_HDFS=0 \
PYTHON_LIB_PATH=/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages \
TF_NEED_OPENCL=0 \
TF_NEED_CUDA=0 \
TF_ENABLE_XLA=1 \
TF_NEED_JEMALLOC=1 \
CC_OPT_FLAGS="-march=native" \
./configure
```

See above for the rest of the compile/install commands.
